duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate scheduling to ensure service delivery in a single-family home and assist with continuous quality improvements in service management and compliance with licensing regulations.

Provide supervision and training of Direct Support Professionals, assist those living in the home to complete personal and medical cares, and collect data and complete documentation of service delivery.

Assure the management and delivery of all contracted services and functions as the representative and main point of contact for Direct Support Professionals working in the home and the individuals living in the home.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
